clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for topical use in over the counter skin products for the treatment of skin dryness and reduction of striae gravidarum stretch marks

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: In a rat study treatment with 10 cocoa butter has been shown to lower liver cholesterol and triglyceride levels without affecting the serum cholesterol levels A20409 Supplementation of cocoa butter reduced the level of creatinine _in vitro_ suggesting that cocoa butter may also beneficial to renal function via antioxidant effects A20409
